title: [Bug]: Icon is missing/wrong after update to latest
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

After updating to the latest version, the icon when opening t4l is missing. It is showing the icon one would associate with settings (although not Ubuntu's system settings!). Because of this, Ubuntu also doesn't allow pinning to the dock anymore.

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

2.0.10

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Install t4l
2. Run
```

### Additional context

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/1e21cb0a-a31f-4ff0-8db2-52428cc0e3a1)
Screenshot from part of my dock.
